alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Kern River Valley; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 26 at 7:50PM PST until March 01 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM MONDAY TO 10 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches possible from 3000 to 4000 feet, 6 to 18 inches from 4000 to 5000 feet, and 18 to 48 inches above 5000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Kern River Valley, Piute Walker Basin, Tehachapi, Grapevine and Frazier Mountain Communities. * WHEN...From 4 AM Monday to 10 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels around 4000 feet on Monday falling to 3000 feet Monday night then hovering between 3000 and 4000 feet Tuesday and Wednesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Kern River Valley; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi
